channel.title: Task1s on ICASSP 2026: Automatic Song Aesthetics Evaluation Challenge
channel.description: Recent content in Task1s on ICASSP 2026: Automatic Song Aesthetics Evaluation Challenge

item.title: Test Set Track 1
item.description: Track 1: Overall Musicality Score Prediction Two types of test sets are provided for Track 1: Set 1: Contains songs generated by the same generative models used in the training set. Set 2 (Challenge Set): Includes songs generated by 10 different open-source generative models, offering a more diverse and challenging evaluation scenario. This set aims to assess each modelâ€™s generalization ability to unseen generation systems. Download link

item.title: Track 1: Overall Musicality Score Prediction
item.description: Description Participants must predict a single holistic aesthetic score for each song, representing an overall musical impression of the song’s artistic quality (corresponding to the Overall Musicality in SongEval dataset). Evaluation will be based on subjective scores from a panel of musician raters.
